hero.title: Learning Revolution with Rangkai Edu
hero.description: Leading LMS platform for schools and teachers in Indonesia. Manage grades, monitor achievements, and engage parents easily.

card1.title: Efficient Grade Input
card1.description: Enter and manage student grades quickly and accurately, saving teachers up to 50% time.

card2.title: Parent View
card2.description: Real-time access to child's grades and progress, increase parent engagement.

card3.title: Student Achievements
card3.description: Track and celebrate student achievements with engaging visual reports.

card4.title: Admin Tools
card4.description: Complete dashboard for school management and data analysis.

testimonial1.quote: "Rangkai Edu has changed the way we manage learning. Very user-friendly and efficient!"

testimonial2.quote: "The best platform for monitoring student achievements and communication with parents."

cta.title: Ready to Start Education Transformation?
